sense.gloss: guest house, private home providing lodging for travelers, bed and breakfast, pension

sdata.j: あの↑民宿↑↓|みんしゅく|↓なら、↑素泊↑↓すど↓まり↑５↑↓ご↓↑千↑↓せん↓↑円↑↓えん↓だよ。
sdata.e: That inn is 5,000 yen a night, meals excluded.

sdata.j: あの↑民宿↑↓|みんしゅく|↓は７↑千↑↓せん↓↑円↑↓えん↓で、↑素泊↑↓すど↓まりは２↑千↑↓せん↓↑円↑↓えん↓↑安↑↓やす↓いよ。
sdata.e: This pension costs 7000 yen. Without meals, it's 2000 yen cheaper.

sdata.j: ↑新↑↓あたら↓しいお↑客↑↓きゃく↓たちが↑民宿↑↓|みんしゅく|↓に↑着↑↓つ↓いて、↑食堂↑↓しょくどう↓で↑一緒↑↓いっしょ↓に↑食↑↓た↓べている↑声↑↓こえ↓が↑聞↑↓き↓こえました。
sdata.e: I could hear the voices of several other guests who had arrived and were already eating together in the main dinning room.
